All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
APIInterbankHandlers
The APIInterbankHandlers class provides utility methods for interacting with the Interbank API to perform credit card transactions such as receiving money and making payments.
APIURL
The APIURL class provides a utility method to start an HTTP server with various endpoint handlers for different parts of the application.
App
The App class serves as the entry point for the main application.
BaseLayer
The BaseLayer class serves as the foundational layer for database operations, providing a shared database connection across derived classes.
Bike
Represents a bike entity with various attributes.
BikeController
The BikeController class provides methods to interact with bike-related operations and data.
BikeHandlers
The BikeHandlers class contains HTTP request handlers for bike-related endpoints.
BikeHandlers.BikeByCategoryIdHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving a list of bikes belonging to a specified category.
BikeHandlers.BikeByDockIdHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving a list of bikes located at a specified dock.
BikeHandlers.BikeInfoByBarcodeHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving information about a bike by its barcode.
BikeHandlers.BikeInfoHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving information about a bike by its ID.
BikeHandlers.BikeListHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving a list of all bikes.
BikeHandlers.EBikeListHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving a list of all e-bikes.
BikeLayer
The BikeLayer class provides methods for managing and interacting with bike-related data.
BikeResponseMessage
The BikeResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various bike-related scenarios.
BikeValidation
This class provides methods for validating bike-related data and states.
Category
The Category class represents a category of bikes with various attributes and pricing information.
CategoryController
The CategoryController class manages interactions between the user interface and the underlying data and logic related to categories of bikes.
CategoryHandlers
The CategoryHandlers class provides HTTP request handlers for managing category-related API endpoints.
CategoryHandlers.CategoryListHandler
Handles HTTP requests for retrieving a list of categories.
CategoryLayer
The CategoryLayer class interacts with the database and provides methods to retrieve and manage category data.
CategoryResponseMessage
The CategoryResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various category-related scenarios.
CategoryValidation
The CategoryValidation class provides methods for validating category-related operations.
Config
The Config class provides constants that define configuration settings for various aspects of the application.
ControlAPI
The ControlAPI class provides utility methods for handling HTTP requests and responses in the control API context.
CreditCard
The CreditCard class represents a credit card with various attributes such as cardholder name, card number, balance, expiration date, and security code.
CreditCardController
The CreditCardController class provides methods to manage credit card transactions and balances.
CreditCardHandlers
The CreditCardHandlers class contains HTTP request handlers for credit card-related endpoints.
CreditCardHandlers.GetBalanceFromCardHandler
HTTP handler for getting the balance from a credit card.
CreditCardHandlers.PayViaCardHandler
HTTP handler for making a payment via a credit card.
CreditCardHandlers.ReceiveMoneyViaCardHandler
HTTP handler for receiving money via a credit card.
CreditCardHandlers.ResetCardHandler
HTTP handler for resetting a credit card.
CreditCardLayer
The CreditCardLayer class provides access to credit card data stored in a JSON format, retrieved from a database table.
CreditCardResponseMessage
The CreditCardResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various credit card-related scenarios in the Interbank subsystem.
CreditCardValidation
The CreditCardValidation class provides methods to validate and authenticate credit card information.
Customer
The Customer class represents a customer entity with a unique customer ID and a username.
CustomerLayer
The CustomerLayer class provides access to customer data stored in a JSON format, retrieved from a database table.
CustomerResponseMessage
The CustomerResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various customer-related scenarios.
CustomerValidation
The CustomerValidation class provides methods for validating customer-related operations.
Dock
The Dock class represents a docking station with a unique dock ID, a name, an image, and an address.
DockController
The DockController class provides methods to interact with docks through the DockLayer.
DockHandlers
The DockHandlers class contains HTTP request handlers for dock-related endpoints.
DockHandlers.DockInfoHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving information about a dock by its ID.
DockHandlers.DockListHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving a list of all docks.
DockHandlers.DockSearchHandler
HTTP handler for searching for docks using a keyword.
DockLayer
The DockLayer class provides access to dock data stored in a JSON format, retrieved from a database table.
DockResponseMessage
The DockResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various dock-related scenarios.
DockValidation
The DockValidation class provides methods for validating dock-related operations.
EBike
Represents an electric bike entity that extends the basic Bike class.
IDatabaseConnection
The IDatabaseConnection interface defines a contract for managing database connections and performing common database operations.
InterbankAPIURL
The InterbankAPIURL class represents a utility for starting an HTTP server that exposes endpoints related to credit card operations within the interbank subsystem.
InterbankApp
The InterbankApp class serves as the entry point for the Interbank subsystem application.
InterbankPostgresConnection
The InterbankPostgresConnection class implements the IDatabaseConnection interface and provides methods for managing database connections and executing queries on an Interbank-related PostgresSQL database.
Invoice
The Invoice class represents an invoice associated with a rental transaction for a bike.
InvoiceController
The InvoiceController class provides methods to manage and interact with invoices.
InvoiceHandlers
The InvoiceHandlers class contains HTTP request handlers for invoice-related endpoints.
InvoiceHandlers.CreateInvoiceHandler
HTTP handler for creating a new invoice.
InvoiceHandlers.InvoiceByCustomerIdHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving invoices associated with a specific customer.
InvoiceHandlers.InvoiceByIdHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving information about an invoice by its ID.
InvoiceHandlers.InvoiceListHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving a list of all invoices.
InvoiceLayer
The InvoiceLayer class provides access to invoice data stored in a JSON format, retrieved from a database table.
InvoiceResponseMessage
The InvoiceResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various invoice-related scenarios.
InvoiceValidation
The InvoiceValidation class provides methods for validating invoice-related operations.
JsonFunction
The JsonFunction class provides utility methods for converting data structures to JSON format.
PostgresConnection
The PostgresConnection class implements the IDatabaseConnection interface and provides methods for managing database connections and executing queries on a PostgresSQL database.
PriceMethod
The PriceMethod class provides utility methods for calculating prices and deposits related to bike rentals and transactions.
Response<T>
The Response class represents a structured response object that includes a code, a message, and an optional associated object of type T.
ResponseMessage
The ResponseMessage interface defines the structure of a response message that includes a code and a corresponding message text.
SyntaxChecker
 
SyntaxCheckerTest
The SyntaxCheckerTest class contains unit tests for the SyntaxChecker utility class.
SyntaxResponseMessage
The SyntaxResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various syntax-related scenarios.
Transaction
The Transaction class represents a transaction associated with bike rental.
TransactionController
The TransactionController class provides methods to manage and interact with transactions.
TransactionHandlers
The TransactionHandlers class contains HTTP request handlers for transaction-related endpoints.
TransactionHandlers.ActiveTransactionHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving active transactions for a specific customer.
TransactionHandlers.CreateTransactionHandler
HTTP handler for creating a new transaction.
TransactionHandlers.GetDepositHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving the deposit information for a bike.
TransactionHandlers.PauseTransactionHandler
HTTP handler for pausing a transaction.
TransactionHandlers.TransactionListHandler
HTTP handler for retrieving a list of all transactions.
TransactionHandlers.UnPauseTransactionHandler
HTTP handler for un-pausing a transaction.
TransactionLayer
This class represents the layer responsible for managing transactions.
TransactionResponseMessage
The TransactionResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various transaction-related scenarios.
TransactionValidation
The TransactionValidation class provides methods to validate transactions and their attributes.
